caption:
Goals are accomplished quicker with teamwork. In collaboration with @mitpics, we were able to secure the patent for a new synthetic material which will serve as the technological basis for a new generation of supercapacitors.

#Lamborghini

Coldplay’s @guyberryman experiences the emotion of driving a Lamborghini with an amazing Aventador SVJ. A pure demonstration of love: that’s what passion is.
#Lamborghini #AventadorSVJ #Coldplay

Brilliant ideas always need brilliant starting points. And just like that, Lamborghini Sián FKP 37 - designed by Centro Stile Lamborghini - is inspired from some of our unbelievable masterpieces: Terzo Millennio, Countach and Marzal.

#Lamborghini #LamborghiniSianFKP37 #AheadOfItsTime #CentroStileLamborghini

Shaping young minds is truly fulfilling. Our Chairman and CEO Stefano Domenicali was guest at @harvardhbs. He discussed the dynamics that led to us becoming a benchmark in the luxury car industry worldwide.
#Lamborghini

Make space for new ideas. On 2nd November 2019, thanks to our collaboration with @nasa and @houstonmethodist, we sent our composite materials to @iss_casis. The analysis of their response would help us further our advancements in the automotive and medical field.
#Lamborghini #NASA #InternationalSpaceStation #Space

Speed is the aphrodisiac that drives us. Huracán EVO proved it yet again on the @F1 tracks at the @cota_official in Austin. Needless to say that it was a spectacular event.

#Lamborghini #HuracanEVO #PirelliHotLaps #USGP

Everything that you own is a reflection of your choice and personality.
Lamborghini’s Ad Personam program has a way of only showing your best traits.
The Viola Nebula body color on this Huracán EVO emphasizes the exclusivity of this Super Sports Car.

#Lamborghini #HuracanEVO #EveryDayAmplified #AdPersonam #MakeItUnique

Reliving the fun we had in September at the Concorso D’Eleganza “Lamborghini & Design” organized by Lamborghini Polo Storico. The event showcased 36 Lamborghinis that were created between 1964 and 2001 while also displaying a few modern models, like the one in this picture by @Royale77. This convoy participated in the drive of over 300 km from Venice and Trieste which made for an unforgettable day!
#Lamborghini #HuracanEVOSpyder #PoloStorico #LamborghiniConcorsodEleganza
They come out at #Halloween and try to take our soul, but we’ve got the ANIMA (now available with «Zombie» mode). #HappyHalloween

Heaven for all Lamborghini enthusiasts: visit the Lamborghini MUDETEC this weekend to have all your burning questions answered. You’ll also get to check out all the iconic models and tour the production lines which will transport you to Ferruccio Lamborghini’s time itself.
#Lamborghini #LamborghiniMUDETEC #Technology

We have always been futuristic in our productions and designs. With a collaboration with @NASA and @houstonmethodist, we’re ready to take this a step forward by being the first automaker to subject samples of our carbon fiber composite materials to the extreme environment of space at the @ISS. Their analysis would yield interesting and useful results for the automotive and medical fields. Photo by @philipprupprecht_ .

#Lamborghini #AventadorSVJ #Nasa #Space

Relive the action-packed weekend we had with @lamborghinisc at the @circuito_de_jerez in the 2019 edition of the Lamborghini World Final with the link in bio. It was an exhilarating event!

#Lamborghini #LamborghiniSC #WorldFinal

Excitement is at its peak at the World Final at the @circuito_de_jerez! This weekend makes it even better, with the launch of two new models – an all-new 12 cylinder hypercar, developed by @lamborghiniSC, and the Urus ST-X, the first super SUV in the world of racing.
#Lamborghini #V12 #UrusSTX #WorldFinal

Rocking on the racetrack. @muse visited us at Sant’Agata Bolognese and took our Super Sports Cars for a spin, and they just loved them.

#Lamborghini #HuracanCoupe #HuracanPerformante #Muse #Music

It’s easy to make good decisions when there are no bad options.
But what would you do if both options are great?
Which one of these Huracán EVO would you choose?

#Lamborghini #HuracanEVO #EveryDayAmplified #ColorItUnique

That’s what style is. In Lamborghini Sesto Elemento, carbon fiber technology combines with the most superb aesthetics, bringing to life a masterpiece of lightness, power and elegance.
#Lamborghini #SestoElemento #FewOff #AboutLamborghini

The task is super simple - prove your love for Lamborghini by guessing from the details which Super Sports Car this is. Share your answer in the comments section.

#Lamborghini #GuessFromDetails

The adrenaline rush of being a part of the Lamborghini Dinamica Terra serves as the perfect motivation for your Monday. Kick start your week by absorbing the versatility of the Urus.

#Lamborghini #LamborghiniDinamicaTerra #Urus #SinceWeMadeItPossible #Travel #MondayMotivation

Our question to you is simple: you get a beautiful detail of one of our Super Sports Car. Now guess the model. Photo by @denniswierenga.

#Lamborghini #GuessFromDetails

Missed our new Fall Winter collection 19/20?

Well, here’s your chance to explore the adventurous spirit of our informal luxury.

Check it out on www.lamborghinistore.com. Link in bio.

#Lamborghini #LamborghiniStyle #FW1920 #InformalLuxury
